welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Villiers-sur-Marne, a charming city known for its rich history and picturesque landscapes. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in its beauty and culture. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Orly Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Orly Airport, mainly used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free wifi throughout the airport for up to 4 hours.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Le Bourget Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Divided into seven sub-terminals, Terminal 2 is the main hub for international flights at Charles De Gaulle Airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for low-cost airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but a premium option is also offered for faster speeds.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Toussus-le-noble Airport, handling all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal building.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi available throughout the airport.
